ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7.1"
SHALL conform to Consol Procedures Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7.1)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:7895, CONF:7896)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)
SHALL conform to Consol Procedures Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7)
SHALL conform to Consol Procedures Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.7.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15425)/@code="47519-4" History of procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15426)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:6278, CONF:15510)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8533, CONF:15511)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8017, CONF:8018)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:8019, CONF:8020)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:7895, CONF:7896)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present in the Procedure Section, there SHALL be at least one procedure, observation or act entry conformant to Procedure Activity Procedure template, Procedure Activity Observation template or Procedure Activity Act template in the Procedure Section. (CONF:8021)
